text: Héctor Méndez Alarcón (born 11 September 1959) is a Mexican politician from Hidalgo. He is with the National Action Party. Between 2000 to 2003, he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Mexican politicians Category:People from Hidalgo (state) Category:Living people
title: Héctor Méndez Alarcón
